name: Hype: The Time Quest
overview: Hype: The Time Quest is an action and adventure game where you can interact with NPCs in fighting as well as in dialogue in search of information, goods, and services. You play has Hype, a medieval knight who happens to fall victim to the curse of Barnak. During this time, he is thrown into the past here he must find his way back. Will his future become worst from anything he does during this time in the past?
